title: MPs call on government to bring sick and injured Gaza children to UK
description: Unicef has estimated that 50,000 children have been killed or injured since the conflict in Gaza began two years ago.
content: The letter, co-ordinated by the Labour MP and GP Dr Simon Opher, said essential infrastructure in Gaza has been destroyed, and a long "blockade" of food, water and medical supplies and the ongoing violence has led to a medical and humanitarian catast... [2852 chars]

title: M6 traffic LIVE updates as long queues build up following crash
content:
Drivers are facing hour-long delays on the M6 near Greater Manchester as urgent repairs take place following a crash.

title: Saudi Arabia Snooker Masters final LIVE RESULTS: O'Sullivan vs Robertson NOW for £500k JACKPOT after two 147s - latest
description: THE final of this year's Saudi Arabia Snooker Masters has been set - which means that someone is 19 frames away from banking a whopping £500,000 jack
content:
'Maddest game'
The Rocket says he thought he was on course to LOSE that game when he was level at 3-3.
But he went up a gear and dominated the second half of the match.
Ronnie said: "It’s probably the maddest game I have ever played in.
